mapper.select: select f.total_price, f.input_date, p.card_num, p.card_bank, d.receive_name, d.receive_phone, d.receive_addr, d.receive_addr_detail, d.receive_zipcode, f.member_num, f.order_num, f.company, f.invoice_no, f.shipping_flag from order_form f, payment p, destination d, member m where (p.order_num=f.order_num and d.order_num=f.order_num and f.member_num=m.member_num) and f.member_num = #{ member_num } and f.order_num = #{ order_num }

select i.item_name, i.item_img, i.item_price, oi.item_cnt, i.item_num from item i, order_item oi, order_form f where (oi.item_num=i.item_num and oi.order_num=f.order_num) and f.member_num = #{ member_num } and f.order_num = #{ order_num }
mapper.delete: delete from order_form where member_num = #{ member_num } and order_num = #{ order_num }
mapper.select: select id, name, email, phone, addr, addr_detail, zipcode from member

select qna_num, qna_subject, qna_flag ,to_char(input_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')input_date, idx from(select qna_num, qna_subject, qna_flag ,input_date, idx, row_number() over(order by idx desc) rnum from(select qna_num, qna_subject, qna_flag , input_date, row_number() over(order by qna_num) idx from qna where ${ field_name } = #{field_value})) where rnum between #{start_num} and #{end_num}
